item.title: Bath Hack 2.1
item.description:
I entered a hackathon called Bath Hack.

The aim of this hackathon was to hack around Bathâ€™s past, present and future. Using all of the open data provided.

Our idea was to create a tool that would allow citzens to easily examine council expenses.

You can see what we shipped here
item.dc:creator: Sam Clift

item.title: Welcome To My Blog
item.description:
I have been doing a lot of interesting things recently and I would like to share them with anyone who is interested

About Me

I am a Software developer currently working in Bath for a company called Cloudfind. I went to the University of the West Of England studying computer science.

I do otherthings as well as code though. I am a keen runner having ran the London Marathon with my best friend
item.dc:creator: Sam Clift
